response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its significance, I understand that its worth might be subjective to you. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair offer that respects both the intrinsic value of the product and your budget. Should you choose to accept, it would not only bring joy to you but also contribute to my personal journey. Let's make this remarkable piece yours today.", "product_price": 950000}
